body.name: Tikom Robot Vacuum and Mop, G8000 Robot Vacuum Cleaner, 2700Pa Strong Suction, Self-Charging, Good for Hard Floors, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 49 mins
features: [2 in 1 Sweeping & Mopping]: G8000 robot vacuum cleaner adopts newest mopping technology, equipped with an electronically controlled water pump and adjustable three-level water output, you can get to enjoy a completely clean home.

[Gyroscope Smart Navigation]: G8000 Robotic Vacuums will clean your home more thoroughly following an efficient Zig-zag path, when compared to random path robotic vacuums. This exclusive smart navigation improves cleaning efficiency by 30%.

[2700PA Suction & Self-Charging]: 2700pa strong suction with excellent cleaning performance. Ideal for short&medium-pile carpets and hardwood floors. it auto will return to Charging Station once Battery is Low.

[APP & Voice & Romote Control]: G8000 Robotic Vacuums can works with App, including 5 cleaning modes: smart clean&edge clean&spot clean&random clean&manual clean, also can connect to Alexa and Google Home, and also equipped remote control.

[Carpet Boost & Boundary Strips]: G8000 Robot Vacuum Cleaner can automatically increase 3X suction power on carpet to provide deeper cleaning. Boundary Strips can help you set None-go areas (Notice: Remove the mop holder first, then clean the carpet).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing robot vacuum and mop combo
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have had my robot friend, Tikom, for a month. First impressions upon opening the box was an “Oooo Aahhh”. The directions said to let your new robot friend charge before first use, but of course, I ran him around immediately to just see how he works! He worked for about ten minutes. I couldn’t figure out how to get him to his home (charging station), but it turns out, he can find his own way home just fine. I recommend that you do take a few minutes to read the directions and familiarize yourself with the remote(if you want, you also can use App, it has more function) It took about 4 hours or so for Tikom to fully charge, then I turned him loose. Let me just say, I thought my floors were clean, or, at least, pretty clean. As it turns out, they were not. They were not clean at all. Tikom has picked up so much fur, dirt, dust, it’s unbelievable. My floors have literally never looked better! They are CLEAN. For real clean. I’ve always had a hard time cleaning under the bed, but now I don’t have to worry about it at all, because my robot friend takes care of it.I have all hardwood floors and tile. I also have a few throw rugs, some thick, some thin. Tikom does a perfect job on the floors, and has no problems navigating over the throw rugs (though he might turn up a corner, but he will run back over it and still get it clean). I don’t think your robot friend would work very well if you have a lot of or mostly carpet. If you have hardwood or mostly hardwood, you will love your new robot friend.Tikom mostly gets from room to room okay – the “up” entry points he cannot do on his own. For example, he cannot get over the threshold into my kitchen, but he can get down the threshold. He also cannot get over the threshold to get in the bathrooms. This is actually fine for me, because I prefer to control when he goes into the kitchen anyway so that I can shake off the rugs and/or pick up the cat food and water bowls and any shoes or other things that might be on the floor. I just put a bar stool in his way to keep him from exiting the kitchen when it’s time for him to clean in the kitchen.Tikom will clean for about 2 hours. He does not have a “plan” so to speak, not like a person would say go from corner to the center of the room, but he is still very thorough, and obviously, his plan is way better than mine since my floors are so much cleaner than they ever were when I was in charge. My advice is to just trust the process and let your robot friend find his way around on his own! Just make sure that you pick up any cords, especially small cords like phone charging cords, and shoe laces or the like, so that he doesn’t accidentally grab onto something he shouldn’t. Tikom also has sensors so that when he comes to a piece of furniture or a wall, he will slow down so as to gently bump it before he turns off into a new direction. I have also noticed that if he comes into contact with a chair or table leg, he will often go in a circle all the way around the leg to clean around it.Once your robot friend is done doing your dirty work for you, he will go back home on his own. If your robot friend cannot find his way home, you may not have provided him enough space. Is that any way to treat your new best friend?? Make sure that he has several feet of clear space in front of his charging station, and that there are a few feet of clear space on the sides of the charging station as well. Also, make sure to empty out his dust bin after every use.The mopping function is great, better than using a Swifter type of mop but not as good as hand mopping, however I love that I don't have to do the mopping and allowing it time to do several passes seems to get the job done seamlessly.Overall, I do recommend this little robot. I am very pleased with this purchase. If you’re in the market for a robot floor cleaning wizard, don’t hesitate to click that Buy Now button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new best friend
reviews.reviewText: I love this little robot cleaner it does what it says. I run it every other day and my floors look great. All the functions work and I was most impressed that it really did Mop my kitchen tile. It works if the floor isn’t too dirty and it’s so simple to do. You just have to remember to block the room off or you’ll find it in other rooms where you don’t want it mopping. I recommend this as an alternative to the much more expensive name brands. I haven’t run it on my carpet because it is very thick so I can’t review that. One day I might give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price you pay!
reviews.reviewText: SUMMARY: Out of the package the product comes with very simple instructions to get you started. Along with the product, it comes with its own maintenance and replacement items such as (2) side brushes, (2) mopping cloth pads, small brush, and replacement air filter. The whole thing on its own is able to maintain itself with great app capabilities. The product does great work in its ability to handle basic floor care maintenance and smart cleaning with a click and forget operation.The robo vacuum itself:The product is overall good quality with good performance efficiency. It is able to handle basic floor care maintenance with its own ease of ability to maintain it with its accessory's that comes with it. It has medium wheels that are able to move with ease on carpet and hard floor surfaces. Its mopping ability is only able to just do the bare minimum and should not expected to mop through spills, stains, and buildups. It should be noted that is does often become stuck extremally often when on carpets and rugs as well as wedge itself under furniture. If your a pet owner, know this product performs excellently on handling all the hair and debris that comes with pets!App:The app is honestly where I was sold the most. It has ability to set schedules, track the life of all components so you know when its time for a change, detect and notify of any problems like being stuck, and so much more. The apps manual controls allow you to easily spot clean or handle difficult areas on your own that the robo vacuum may miss or not clean on its entirety. I have yet to have any problems with the app itself and it makes the robo vacuum its worth.NOTE: if you need more boundary markers (they do not provide much) go to a nearby home improvement store and get magnetic tape close to the same thickness of the original and you will be set.Pictures to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a valentines gift for the family. We ended up opening it early just because and have used it a number of times since opening it. It’s a great little vacuum/mopping robot. It’s very thorough and although there is a little bit of prep work before we can run it, it still saves my wife and I time and energy. It comes with perimeter blocking magnets you can adhere to the floor but we’re renting a house currently and want to save them for when we buy a house. So we’ve opted for just placing chairs in areas we want to block off and it works just fine. The vacuum works very well especially on hard wood floors, I can’t believe the amount of stuff it picks up each time we use it, which has been at the end of every day since we’ve opened it and set it up. It’s easy to use and is very thorough. I don’t know for sure but it seems as if it is learning the layout of the house a little better each time we run it. I say this because the time it takes to clean seems to be getting more efficient, and I’ve noticed it slow down before bumping into something and sometimes avoiding bumping into certain things all together compared to the first or second time we’ve run it. The mopping function works well, it isn’t perfect but it’s certainly better than nothing and it is a noticeable difference. My kids like watching it and have fun picking up small crumbs and stuff to throw in front of it and say the vacuum is eating it. Considering what we paid for it and what others I’ve seen here I think this is a tremendous value. I fail to see how another one priced 2-3x more than this could cleaned 2-3x better.

Anteriormente tuve una Kyvol E20 que era una maravilla, sin embargo, quise hacer un upgrade y encontré esta Ticom que además de aspirar tambien trapea.Tengo 6 perros, todo el tiempi salen y entran a la casa dejando sus huellitas marcadas.Ticom se encarga de aspirar tierra, pasto, polvo y también de trapear.La tengo programada para hacer limpieza pero también puedo dar la instrucción por voz en cualquier momento pues la tengo ligada a Google Home.Vale cada peso de su precio!

The media could not be loaded. Ich hatte schon vor 2 Jahren einen Saugroboter der nicht so teuer war. Hauptsächlich wegen den Katzenhaare, die meine Katze am Tag extrem viel verliert. Mit dem alten war ich teilweise ganz zufrieden, aber er war nicht so stark wie dieser Tikom. Der neue jetzt, etwas teurer saugt tatsächlich auch das Katzenstreu und das herumliegende trockene Katzenfutter auf ohne Probleme. Das hilft mir enorm bei meinem Haushalt. Der Roboter hat 3 Leistungsstufen 1 ist sehr leise und Stufe 3 etwas lauter. Aber mein großer Staubsauger ist da noch lauter, oder mein Kaffeeautomat. Der Roboter macht seine Arbeit gründlich, geht nochmal durch wenn er glaubt, er hat was vergessen. Mit der Fernbedienung kann man ihn manuell auch mal in ein Zimmer schicken oder gleich auf die Ladestation. Die Ladestation findet er auch gleich und er saugt nicht ewig bis der Akku leer ist, sondern wenn er fertig ist, dann spricht er und kündigt sozusagen seinen Feierabend an. Per App kann man den Akkustand einsehen und der Akku ist nach 60 qm Wohnung saugen noch bei 75%. Den Zeittimer ist auch sehr praktisch, er beginnt pünktlich. Es wird kurz angekündigt, das er nun die Reinigung beginnt und fährt dann los. Ich bin total zufrieden mit unserem Saugroboter, die ich Jenny nenne, aufgrund der weiblichen Stimme. Die Wischfunktion habe ich noch nicht getestet, das will ich demnächst mal im Eingangsbereich ausprobieren.
Excelente, limpia y trapea al mismo tiempo y tiene un nivel de succión bastante fuerte.

Ich hatte bisher keinen Saug Roboter und habe aufgrund der vielen guten Rezensionen diesen einfach bestellt und war umso begeisterter, dass er für das Geld sogar eine Wischfunktion hat. Ich habe eine kleine Wohnung (65m²) und zwei Katzen. Dafür perfekt. Kabel und alles was im Weg steht müssen hoch gestellt werden. Erhöhungen schafft er mühelos. In andere Zimmer, auf Teppiche usw. Man kann mit und ohne Wischen saugen. Ich nutze ihn ohne die App und lasse ihn laufen, wenn ich zu Hause bin, falls er irgendwo hängen bleibt oder ich ihn in einem großen Zimmer einsperre damit er alles saugt und nicht ins nächste Zimmer flüchtet. Akku hält 2 Stunden und die Wohnung ist in kurzer Zeit fertig. Er ist schnell, gründlich und fährt die Wege strukturiert ab. Instandsetzung ist kinderleicht. Ich bin absolut begeistert und würde ih jedem empfehlen. Eine riesen Erleichterung im Haushalt.

reviews.reviewTitle: 🤖 Robot aspirapolvere 🧹 Tikom G8000: con funzione lavapavimenti! 😉
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Anticipo subito che questo dispositivo mi ha sorpreso non poco, dato l'attuale prezzo di acquisto. 😎 Aiuta tantissimo nelle pulizie domestiche quotidiane, andiamo a scoprirne i dettagli!Il packaging 📦 comprende:✔ Robot aspirapolvere Tikom✔ Base di ricarica✔ Serbatoio aggiuntivo per lavare i pavimenti✔ 2 panni in microfibra✔ 4 spazzole raccogli detriti✔ Telecomando✔ un filtro Hepa di ricambio✔ Bande magneticha per isolare le zone✔ Biadesivo 3M✔ Alimentatore✔ Manuale d’istruzioni📋 Specifiche tecniche: il robot monta un motore capace di erogare una potenza di aspirazione fino a 27000Pa, quindi un valore notevole per questa categoria di device. 💪 Possiede un ottimo sistema di filtraggio a più livelli, mediante filtri a rete e filtro HEPA lavabile. La rumorosità 🔊 è abbastanza contenuta non si superano i 55 dB, il robot infatti non da fastidio nemmeno alla massima efficienza. Buona anche la dotazione di sensori anticollisione ed anticaduta. La batteria 🔋 in dotazioni ha una capacità di 2600 mAh. 😉😎 Design ed ergonomia: il robot si presenta con un design molto compatto, con dimensioni 📏 tali da raggiungere anche i punti più difficili (altezza di circa 76 mm). La qualità dei materiali è buona, nel complesso il robot è moto solido e robusto. Riesce tranquillamente a superare piccoli ostacoli alti anche 2 cm, merito delle ruote gommate e tassellate che riescono a farlo sollevare senza problemi. 💪 L’aspirazione avviene mediante un unico rullo costituito da setole dure, mentre lo sporco viene convogliato da due spazzole a tre raggi che lavorano in controfase. Esteticamente ha un design sobrio ed elegante, con plastiche nere di buona qualità, in particolare sullo strato superiore presenta una finitura lucida che gli conferisce un tocco di eleganza, il robot riesce ad integrarsi benissimo nei diversi contesti d’arredo. Nella parte superiore presenta un tasto di avvio/stop pulizia e uno per il ritorno alla base, retroilluminati da un elegante led che cambia colore in base alle azioni eseguite. 🔝🧹 Modalità di pulizia: questo aspirapolvere possiede 2 diverse configurazioni di pulizia, ovvero: 1) “Solo aspirazione” 💨 che pulisce in modo discreto la superficie trattata, non lascia traccia di polvere, peli o altri detriti, aspira tranquillamente anche piccoli sassolini e cereali; 2) “Aspirazione & lavaggio pavimenti”, 💨 💦 questa è la modalità che preferisco e che mi ha stupito, in sostanza basta riempire il serbatoio con dell'acqua, il robot aspirerà lo sporco lasciando contemporaneamente un velo d’acqua mediante l’apposito panno in microfibra, ovviamente non aspettatevi la rimozione di macchie più ostinate, ma se usato quotidianamente, aiuterà a tenere il pavimento sempre pulito. 👏 In entrambe le configurazioni il dispositivo può usare diversi tipi di algoritmi durante il percorso di pulizia, tra cui: automatico, a spirale e lungo i bordi delle stanze. Inoltre la serie di sensori disponibili sul robot permette di evitare i diversi ostacoli (tavoli, divani, scalini ecc.) e di raggiungere qualunque punto della casa, nonostante non esegua una scansione reale della casa, riesce tranquillamente a restituire una mappatura dei punti in cui è passato. 👍📱 Mobile App e 💡 smart features: l’app è semplice da usare, permette di: avviare/interrompere la pulizia; ritornare sulla base di ricarica; impostare automazioni per programmare la pulizia; visionare la cronologia delle pulizie passate. La comodità sta nel fatto che è possibile eseguire tutte queste azioni anche da remoto, inoltre il robot può anche essere gestito mediante un pratico telecomando, che permette anche di guidare il dispositivo manualmente. È possibile controllare il robot anche mediante i comodissimi comandi vocali 🗣 (sia Google Assistant che Amazon Alexa). Altro aspetto fondamentale di questo robot è la sua capacità di autogestirsi, infatti, prima di scaricarsi completamente, ritorna in automatico sulla base di ricarica, per poi riprendere dal punto in cui aveva interrotto la pulizia, ciò è utile in case molto ampie. 😍📡 Connettività: la base di ricarica contiene un modulo wifi che funziona alla banda di 2,4 GHz, in grado di connettersi alla propria rete domestica e di essere raggiunto anche da remoto, a sua volta ovviamente la base impartirà i diversi comandi al robot. La connessione è sempre stabile e non ho registrato alcun problema. 💪🔋 Autonomia: buona autonomia, con una sola ricarica ho pulito tranquillamente 80 metri quadri. Anche se dovesse scaricarsi prima di completare il ciclo di pulizia non ci saranno grossi problemi, visto che il ritorno alla base e la ripartenza sono automatici. 😉👍 PRO: ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo; qualità dei materiali discreta; potenza di aspirazione notevole; funzione di lavaggio con acqua e panno in microfibra; usandolo quotidianamente è possibile tenere casa sempre pulita; app mobile dedicata; design sobrio ed elegante; ottima autonomia.👎 CONTRO: nessuno. 🙅‍♂‍🔵 Conclusioni: attualmente è possibile portarlo a casa con 199 € il che è ottimo, visto che avrete un notevole aiuto nelle faccende domestiche grazie alla funzione di aspirazione combinata a quella di lavaggio. Consiglio questo prodotto a tutti perché offre benefici tangibili sia in case grandi che piccole, nelle abitazioni in cui tutte le persone adulte sono sempre fuori per lavoro diventa quasi una comodità irrinunciabile, una volta provato è difficile farne a meno, lo consiglio fortemente anche a chi ha animali domestici 🐶 🐱 in casa (per via dei peli) e a chi soffre di allergie stagionali, in quanto evita l’accumularsi di polline ed acari 🦠 su tutte le superfici domestiche. Prodotto promosso a pieni voti, perché ha tanto da offrire ad un prezzo accessibile a tutti! 🤩[♂️ Diego del team ArchDRD]
